product_name: Benefit CosmeticsValue Size Liquid Lip Blush & Cheek Tint
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit's iconic rose-tinted lip stain was created for an exotic dancer in the 1970s, and has since soared to cult-fave status. The precise lip applicator glides right on lips & blends over cheeks for a gorgeous look in seconds and the kiss-proof color lasts for hours.
details: DetailsFeaturesRose-tinted lip stainNatural-finishSmudge-proofSheer & buildableLongwearItem 2620380How To UseHOW TO APPLY:Smooch-proof & smudge-proof!HOW TO APPLY: Glide onto lips, layering to build intensity. Dot and blend quickly onto cheeks.BEAUTY TIP:Pout pretty! Wear Benetint under lipstick or gloss for kissable color that lasts all day. Smooch-proof & smudge-proof.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Carmine (CI 75470), Methylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Maltodextrin, Benzyl Salicylate, Bht.Disclaimer: product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: HOW TO APPLY:Smooch-proof & smudge-proof!HOW TO APPLY: Glide onto lips, layering to build intensity. Dot and blend quickly onto cheeks.BEAUTY TIP:Pout pretty! Wear Benetint under lipstick or gloss for kissable color that lasts all day. Smooch-proof & smudge-proof.
ingredients: Bht.Disclaimer: product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product
please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: It's okay for a stain
reviews.comments: I purchased PInk Lemonade and at first it literally glides on, wet, stainy and perfect.  But in the drydown it begins to bleed and then dry.  It wasn't moisturizing, it bled and the color was splotchy.  After it dries it leaves a lip-liner effect around the lips and not much color in the middle.  IDK, maybe because I'm older that it bleeds but it just wasn't a great quality and there are other stains which are better. Maybe this was trying to be half lipstick and half tint.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: I love how it looks

reviews.headline: I love this so much
reviews.comments: I loved this. Would totally recommend. I bought it because I had heard it was amazing, and it did not disappoint. The color is beautiful, and it really stays on well without looking blotchy. It blends really really well, without too much effort. I would buy it again for sure.

reviews.headline: Bleeds
reviews.comments: Don't use this on your lips it bleeds

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love this product is so beautiful and wonderful, I really recommend this product because I love the color and texture of this product so I think it's very nice for who wants a lipstick different but at the same time that feels comfortable

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I love this stuff so much I've gotten so many compliments on it recently. I have a slightly olive undertone and the benetint color looks amazing. I dab it abt 2-3 times on my cheek and use a damp beauty blender and it stays ALL day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Love this stain! The color is so beautiful! I was wondering about price point but honestly A little bit goes a long way! Im sure that this stain will last me a very long time.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments:
Personally it stays on all say, besitiful color, and price for product seems fair as again it stays on all day! Touch up may be needed after eating or drinking but it does not come off after! 

Im a teacher so I needed something to really stick for 8 hours!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I'm sure everyone has seen the hype around this product online and so naturally I purchased the product and fell in love! When I want to run errands but don't want to get too glammed up I usually put some benetint on my lips and cheeks along with some brown tint and am ready to go! The product doesn't feel too oily as some of the other dupes I have tried but I also love how buildable this product is! I tend to do 1-2 swipes because It is very pigmented. Another reason I love this lip product is because its an instant tint whereas other products have you leave it on for a couple of minutes which can be a deal breaker when you're going up against time, the bottle size is perfect as it fits in my purse and I honestly never go out without my benetint because you never know when you may need to touch up. I have repurchased the rose and raspberry tints because they're the most perfect cute colors!

reviews.headline: OK product
reviews.comments: The product does has long lasting effects however it sometimes over stains one area and not the other on my lips. But does have beautiful color and followed with a chapstick of gloss and be very attractive.

reviews.headline: not good
reviews.comments: it didn't really stain my lips.  it settled into my tiny lip wrinkles.

reviews.headline: My favorite blush!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product, it stains very nicely and quickly, these bottles last a very long time!

reviews.headline: Playtint
reviews.comments: My favorite is the playtint! I use it mostly use it as a lip stain but I also use it for blush! It isn't as liquid as the Original Benetint. This one is more creamy! The stain lasts me literally ALL DAY! Even after eating and drinking! â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†

reviews.headline: Fail
reviews.comments: Not a fan of this. Tried it on with a representative and loved the color. When I got home it was totally different, I don't know if my package was mislabeled or what but I can't wear this!

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: Over priced. It can burn a little when applying to lips. It does not stay on like I was told it would.

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I've been using Benetint for years and I swear by it, seriously.  I wear very little makeup, so this is the perfect product if you also aren't a huge makeup fan.  It provides the perfect amount of pigment and is definitely buildable.  The new colors (dark cherry and raspberry) are incredible as well!  If you're a big fan of the original Benetint formula, I recommend checking them out.  The other colors are a different formula than the original, so they do look different on the skin and I don't love them as much.  10/10 product!

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: I have had this product for s little but now has lasted a long time and am abt to but anouther great summer blush and lip tint

reviews.headline: Returned...
reviews.comments: I had to return this. I tried the product using the tester in store and the color was amazing and did not bleed on the back of my hand. This product may have worker well  on my cheeks, however, on my lips it was a totally different color and bled like crazy. It's too bad, but I was looking for a lip tint, not rouge.

reviews.headline: Wear it everyday
reviews.comments: My makeup routine has become soooo streamlined with this. OG benetint on lips and cheeks. For a more natural look ill soften the color on my lips with a damp qtip - looks so natural and fresh faced. Then I brush my brows and add mascara. Sometimes a tiny bit of concealer. Love it!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Use it all the time in the summer and works great.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Introduced in S Korea way before and waited to long to get this item.
Personally prefer to use as blush then tint
but this is pretty coral orange color!
faceoff_positive.headline: FINALLY

faceoff_negative.comments: The color is amazing and so is the staying power, BUT if you have breakouts or even small pimples or imperfections right on your cheek or whereever you place this..it leaves dots that are a darker pink and for me breaking out a lot...this product doesnt work that well for me. So be aware if you have breakouts/imperfections.
faceoff_negative.headline: Its good but has one problem
